reg_pit.acttitle: Land Act; Ministry of Lands, Parks and Housing Act
reg_pit.title: Crown Land Fees Regulation

change.changenote: Section 3 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 269/2003, effective October 4, 2010.

section.sectiontext: No fees are payable in respect of an application described in section 1 of this regulation if the Oil and Gas Commission is exercising its authority for that application under section 17 of the Oil and Gas Commission Act.

change.changenote: Section 3 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 91/2011, effective May 19, 2011.

section.sectiontext: No fees are payable in respect of an application described in section 1 of this regulation if the Oil and Gas Commission is exercising its authority for that application under section 8 of the Oil and Gas Activities Act.
